ValidationRule.description: If NSS Source = Inbound or Outbound, only NSS Mngr Admin or SA can update Referring Employee field
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( OR(ISPICKVAL( NSS_Source__c, 'Inbound'), ISPICKVAL( NSS_Source__c, 'Outbound') ) , ISCHANGED( Referring_Employee__c ), NOT(BEGINS( $Profile.Name, 'System Admin')), NOT($Profile.Name = 'NSS Manager Admin') ,(((NOW() - CreatedDate) * 1000) > 4) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You do not have permission to change the Referring Employee if the NSS Source is Inbound or Outbound.
